workshoptitle: DB Security - Advanced Compression with Transparent Data Encryption(TDE)

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Understand the architecture of this workshop and what it can do

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Transparent Data Encryption (TDE)
tutorials.description: Create new encrypted tablespace which leverages Oracle Transparent Data Encryption (TDE)

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Enable advanced compression and online redefinition into encrypted tablespace
tutorials.description: Online Compression to encrypted tablespace via online redefinition

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
